posts.author: Nekro83
posts.content:
Hi!

I'm Looking for a cleric based build. Caster/Melee possibly or Caster/Ranged

It will be a Lawful-Neutral Human Inquisitor.

Here are server rules:

I Can't Take any monk level.

I have to take at least 3 levels in the first class before multiclassing and at lest 3 levels in each class before tricalssing.

I can chose between War, Strenght, protection and Helaing domains.

Thank you in advance for helping :)

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
Solo or party?

PvM or PvP? (can't build one to service both needs. sry.)  If PvP, what classes do you plan to focus your dueling against?

Level cap?

Low-, mid- or high-magic enhancements?

Feat changes?

Subraces?

Permahaste items?

Other than monk, any prohibited or seriously-nerfed standard or prestige classes?  If nerfed, what are the class changes?

posts.author: Nekro83
posts.content:
Solo, Mainly PvM, occasionally PvP

Level cap 40

Low magic world.

No Other restrictions or modifications...

Also Red dregon disciple is prohibited.

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
Okay.  Better. 

Then if low magic, haste is invaluable since low magic almost never has any permahaste or crit immune items.  Same for UMD.  Makes a huge difference.

Therefore, you'd either want to multi to a class that can extend haste (bard/wiz/sorc) or else rely on haste scrolls (if available) or speed pots.

Low magic typically doesn't abound in dispellers so your caster level should be able to be quite low (<20) and still be effective.  You could use cleric to self-buff and bard for skill dumps and extended haste, probably in robes unless you use still spells but which will prevent extended versions.  Which brings up another common issue in low magic... can you save skills or must you use all of them each level?  It matters.

The key will be balancing 3 abilities (WIS/CHA and either STR or DEX) but fortunately, cleric can compensate for a pedestrian primary attack ability very well and you wouldn't need more than CHA 14 to get the most from bard casting.  Temporarily thinking something like Bard 10-14, Cleric 16, CoT 10.  Probably not high enough INT for a broad skill set, though.  Maybe Taunt or maybe not.

Assuming there are no alignment restrictions (non-evil, non-lawful) with the deity (there often are, actually), bard/CoT should work fine.  Perhaps a human clc/brd/CoT?  It could self-buff weapon/armor very high (especially going as a robed DEXer) and still have adequate casting potential.  There probably are already some builds around with that combo that could be modified for the 3-level qualifying sequence on your server.  Check the legacy archive until I or another guild member can check back in.

Trying to think out of the box here. Impressions?

edit: Found just one build that fits my suggestion, but it pumps CHA instead of an attack ability which I am not a fan of.  Anyway, check it out to see the feats and general framework for potential. The build: Diva of the Goddess bard 15/cleric 15/champion of Torm 10 (human) by theshadow0015.  Max built a bard dump Linu version which probably won't work in this case due to Travel being prohibited but still worth checking how he managed his selections.

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
Here's an example of what I was hinting at.  Note that the combo of successful Taunt with Curse Song 14 will add +9 AB that does NOT count towards the AB cap like Bard Song, all the cleric buffs and weapon enhancement.  This could be very powerful with some patience to allow it to develop into far epic levels.  Choose from the list of simple weapons.
Spoiler [+]

Bard(14), Cleric(16), Champion of Torm(10), Any Non-lawful non-evil Human

STR: 14 (28)
DEX: 8
CON: 10
WIS: 16 (18)
INT: 14
CHA: 14

01: Brd(1): Blind Fight, Curse Song
02: Brd(2)
03: Brd(3): Weapon Focus
04: Clc(1): STR+1 (15), 2 Domains (choose!)
05: Clc(2)
06: Clc(3): Extend Spell
07: Clc(4)
08: Clc(5): STR+1 (16)
09: Clc(6): Empower Spell
10: Clc(7)
11: CoT(1)
12: CoT(2): STR+1 (17), KD, Power Attack
13: CoT(3)
14: CoT(4): Cleave
15: Clc(8): ImpCrit
16: Clc(9): STR+1 (18)
17: Brd(4)
18: Clc(10): Div Shield
19: Brd(5)
20: Clc(11): STR+1 (19)
21: Clc(12): Div Might
22: CoT(5)
23: CoT(6): Epic Weapon Focus
24: Brd(6): WIS+1 (17), Grt STR (20)
25: Brd(7)
26: CoT(7)
27: Clc(13): Grt STR (21)
28: Clc(14): WIS+1 (18)
29: Clc(15)
30: CoT(8): Grt STR (22), Epic Prowess
31: CoT(9)
32: CoT(10): STR+1 (23), Armor Skin
33: Brd(8): Grt STR (24)
34: Brd(9)
35: Brd(10)
36: Brd(11): STR+1 (25), Grt STR (26)
37: Brd(12)
38: Clc(16)
39: Brd(13): Grt STR (27)
40: Brd(14): STR+1 (28)

HP: 312
Saves (F/W/R): 27/31/25 (36/40/34 vs spells)
BAB: 25
AB (max, naked): 38 (melee), 25 (ranged)
AC (naked/mundane armor/shield only): 19/30

Concentration 30(30), Discipline 43(52), Perform 19(21), Spellcraft 43(45), Taunt 43(45), Tumble 40(39), UMD 31(33)
